title: Aki no Kanade
synopsis: Aki Miyagawa moved to Tokyo to pursue her dream to be a taiko drummer, but had a hard time balancing her strict training regimen with her part-time job. Now, after 15 years, she's returning to coach others for a taiko festival.
staff: [['Suzuki, Youhei', ['Director']], ['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Ishida, Miyuki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Yaegashi, Youhei', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
